registration.title: Registration Successful
registration.body: Please click the button below to verify your email.

emailVerification.title: Email Verification Required
emailVerification.body: To verify your email, please enter your email address and click 'Verify' below.

accountSetupCompleted.title: Registration Process Completed
accountSetupCompleted.body: Congratulations! You've successfully completed the registration process. You can now access and enjoy all the features of the application. Welcome aboard!

organizationInviteSent.title: Invitations on Their Way!
organizationInviteSent.body: Your recipients will receive them shortly.
